treksJson.name: Sar Pass Trek
treksJson.attractions: Forests, Meadows, Quaint villages, Snow-covered mountains
treksJson.description: Sar Pass is a perfect trek for beginners. It?s apt for those who want to experience all kinds of terrain. Forests, meadows, quaint villages, or snow-covered mountains, this trail offers a gamut of experiences to trekkers.   The trek starts from Kasol, which is a haven for backpackers from around the globe, and attracts large weekend crowds; many of which are the city youth, eager for a slice of the bohemian lifestyle. To cater to the tourists, the shops are well-stocked with both, necessities and luxuries. There are plenty of stay options ? both, pocket-friendly and high-end, and one can choose from Israeli, Continental, Indian, and Chinese cuisines.
